modifier.tinker_create_equipment.backtan: Stores pressurized air for diving and fire resistance. Capacity increases with modifier level.
modifier.tinker_create_equipment.diving_: Allows for extended underwater breathing using pressuruzed air and enhanced underwater vision.
Allows for improved movement underwater, reducing drag, increasing speed, and allows walking on the bottom.
modifier.tinker_create_equipment.modifie: Adds Diving Helmet, Backtank, and Diving Boots modifiers to Tinkers’ armor, hooking into Create’s air & lava‐swim logic very jankily. Trust me, it can get a lot worse.
Dive into the depths with Tinker's Diving Modifiers!
